data.title: EXiT: The Game - The Forgotten Island
data.meta_description: "EXiT - The Forgotten Island" is a challenging cooperative board game based on "Escape room" mechanics. Enter the largest board game store in the Baltics, easy and fast delivery.
data.text:
It all started as an idyllic sailing expedition, but turned into a stormy nightmare. After a yacht wreck, find yourself on the beach of a mysterious island. There you find a vast player made of pure gold and a very disturbing message. Can you solve the puzzles and escape the island?

"EXiT: The Game" series of games are challenging cooperative board games based on "escape room" mechanics where players must solve various tasks together to find the solution to the puzzles and get out of difficult situations.

Board game " EXiT: The Game - The Forgotten Island " consists of 1 scenario.

WARNING: The game can be played once, as the gameplay may break game elements, and there will be a known workaround.

Difficulty:3/5

Age: from 12 years.

Duration: 60 - 120 min

Number of players: 1 - 4
